summary.what: Multi-event hooks: SessionStart, PreCompact, Stop, PostToolUse
summary.why: Single SessionStart hook had 0% compliance for undocumented commits; 4 reinforcement points (start, compact, post-commit, stop) cover the full session lifecycle
summary.how: timbersHookConfig slice, addTimbersHooks/removeTimbersHooks generalization, upgrade path preserves existing hooks
